attributes.action: To take action now to ensure that the Carbon Capture project at Peterhead power Station goes ahead so that we in Scotland can take the lead in this technology worldwide.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Delays imposed by government are going to prevent this project to develop a carbon emission free power station at Peterhead. This project would make this country a world leader in this area of Carbon Capture Technology.
